Posts.Content: Apr 7, 2009 10:32PM clarence wrote: my name is actually sherri but clarence is the quickest name i could think of that wasn't taken.  i have cancer and had a lumpectomy in 2003 and the chemo and radiation in 2004 and from the middle of the radiation treatment i felt pain but they said it shouldn't be giving me pain cause it was helping.  well, it didn't go away and i found out later (like last year after having massive pain for that many years) that they damaged my ribs and now i have constant pain there and am on narcotics and will be for the rest of my life.  has ANYONE else had this problem?  my doctor (the one that actually found the answer) said that 25% of the women who have breast cancer and go through radiation treatments have this problem...So, let me know, ok?  Has ANYONE else gone through this? thank you for listening sherri
Posts.Title: Soreness and Pain after Radiation Minnegirl1 Shirlann
